data.name: Founding Titan
data.description: Total control over the titans, manipulation of the memories and biology of the eldians.

data.name: Attack Titan
data.description: Great physical strength and endurance; ability to “see” memories of future carriers.

data.name: Colossal Titan
data.description: Enormous size; ability to emit superheated steam explosions; great destructive power.

data.name: Armored Titan
data.description: Armored body with plate armor; high resistance and defensive capability.

data.name: Female Titan
data.description: Great agility and melee fighting ability; can crystallize its skin for defense or attack.

data.name: Beast Titan
data.description: Ability to throw objects with deadly accuracy; the titan's physical form can vary (in Zeke's case, with ape-like features); Zeke Yeager can transform eldians into titans with his scream.

data.name: Jaw Titan
data.description: Great speed and agility; extremely strong jaws and claws capable of destroying very hard materials.

data.name: Cart Titan
data.description: Great endurance, able to remain in its titan form for long periods; speed and ability to carry weapons and equipment.

data.name: War Hammer Titan
data.description: Ability to create structures and weapons from hardened material, including spears, hammers and other objects. The wearer can control the titan from a separate capsule.
carriers: Unnamed member of the family TYBUR
